meanings.definition: A card game typically played with a 48-card deck.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we enjoyed playing penuchle together.
meanings.sent2: Let's invite our friends over for a game of penuchle this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The penuchle cards seemed to have a mind of their own, jumping out of the deck.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in penuchle were like magic, effortlessly winning every round.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shuffling cards filled the room as we prepared for a thrilling game of penuchle.

meanings.definition: A meld of the queen of spades and jack of diamonds in the game of penuchle.
meanings.sent1: To win, you need to have the perfect penuchle in your hand.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her impressive penuchle during the game.
meanings.sent3: The penuchle combination was so rare, it felt like finding a treasure.
meanings.sent4: His penuchle play was strategic, always catching his opponents off guard.
meanings.sent5: The penuchle meld gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of victory in the game.
